snippet.title: Super Snail X: Uninvited Guests | FIRST LOOK TRAILER
snippet.description:
Join the adventure in our latest game where a misfit band of time-traveling snails takes on the Demon Gods of the apocalypse! 

Pre-register Super Snail on iOS and Android now! bit.ly/Super-Snail

First episode premieres 7/9! 

We're releasing the trailer for our animated series, Super Snail X: Uninvited Guests! 

Episodes are short, about 2-3 minutes tops, and you'll get to see our main snailer try to fend off the Hitmen and other guests who often stop by your home! 
 
When the first episode drops on 7/9, I'll give the user with the most liked / top comment a super secret Snail Code!

Rally your Snail Clubs for those updoots. 🐌♣

Oh, and don't forget to PRE-REGISTER FOR SUPER SNAIL!! 
https://bit.ly/Super-Snail

Discord: https://discord.gg/supersnail 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SuperSnailOfficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/supersnailofficial
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SuperSnailUS 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@supersnailofficial
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SuperSnail_US/ 

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more gameplay videos!
